    Scale Class

    Scale.Rd

    Base class for all scale types

    Methods

    Public methods

    • Scale$new()

    • Scale$transform()

    • Scale$render_axis()

    • Scale$clone()

    Method new()

    Initialize a new scale

    Usage

    Scale$new(aesthetic, name = NULL, breaks = NULL, labels = NULL, limits = NULL)

    Arguments

    aesthetic

    The aesthetic this scale applies to (e.g., "x", "y", "color")

    name

    The name to use for the axis or legend

    breaks

    Vector of break points

    labels

    Vector of labels for the breaks

    limits

    Vector of length 2 giving the range of the scale

    Method transform()

    Transform data from data space to plot space

    Usage

    Scale$transform(x)

    Arguments

    x

    Values to transform

    Method render_axis()

    Render the axis or legend for this scale

    Usage

    Scale$render_axis(side = "bottom")

    Arguments

    side

    The side to render the axis on ("top", "right", "bottom", "left")

    Method clone()

    The objects of this class are cloneable with this method.

    Usage

    Scale$clone(deep = FALSE)

    Arguments

    deep

    Whether to make a deep clone.
